description: In this fantasy role-play, Lia Lor wants to surprise her husband when he returns from a business trip. She ties herself to a bed and leaves a message on the door asking him to pretend to be her captor. However, things don't work out as planned for poor Lia and she soon finds herself at the mercy of her husband's friend, James Deen. Her playful game of damsel in distress has now become a reality as he ruthlessly dominates and fucks her like she has never been before!
title: Ravished by the Wrong Man
